resources.string: We founded our gym upon a philosophy based on promoting both the performance and longevity of our athletes. We know that, all too often, we are encouraged to choose results over the well-being of our bodies. Jiu jitsu, boxing, kickboxing, wrestling, and strength/conditioning are all high-impact sports. Because of this, it is vital to have a coach that is knowledgeable about recovery and the importance of avoiding over-training. We are proud to offer some of the best martial arts instruction in the Pacific Northwest.
